body_html: do you have any idea what the success rate is for getting this working on untested AMD gpus? I'm specifically interested if it has been tested for AMD Radeon Pro 460 @rodburns. I would be happy to spend a few hours getting ubuntu running on my Macbook laptop if there is any hope with an untested GPU
